fields.name: Kitchen Table
fields.description: Learn with friends! Teach each other how to make things around your kitchen table.
fields.figures:
• 1-5 friends
  • 15 minutes - 1 hour.
  • At home or in a cafe
fields.additional:
• Gather your friends and family in a comfortable setting.
  • Make something together on the web using fun projects.
  • Share what you made and get inspired to explore more.

fields.name: Hack Jam
fields.description: Make something! Team up to transform your ideas into real world solutions.
fields.figures:
• 10 - 50 participants
  • 1 - 2 days
  • At a school, office or open space
fields.additional:
• Define an interesting challenge or question to explore.
  • Team up different skill-sets to brainstorm solutions.
  • Collaboratively build a 'minimum viable prototype' to demonstrate your idea.

fields.name: Pop Up
fields.description: Throw a learning party! Invite local groups to play together and build a network.
fields.figures:
• 2-10 organizations
  • Half day
  • In an open space
fields.additional:
• Set up learning stations led by local organization.
  • Sample the activities and hack as long as participants like.
  • Discuss next steps for a community in your city.
